Title: Relates to peace officer status for persons employed by the town of Southold serving on Fishers Island as public safety officers
Summary: Grants peace officer status to persons employed by the town of Southold serving on Fishers Island as public safety officers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to granting peace officer status to persons employed by the town of Southold serving on Fishers Island as public safety officers
